alpha 2 three] bravo.

alpha 3 bravo.

alpha 4 seven] bravo.

alpha 5 bravo.

alpha 6 bravo.

alpha 8 thirteen* bravo.

alpha 9 fifteen* bravo.

alpha 10 seventeen** bravo.

alpha 11 bravo.

alpha 12 bravo.

alpha 13 bravo.

Mixing code with inline notes:

Inline note with 14 bravo.

Inline note with 15 bravo.

mixed ^[ with code]

  1. Inlines notes are easier to write, since you don’t have to pick an identifier and move down to type the note.↩︎

  2. one [balanced↩︎

  3. four [unbalanced five↩︎

  5. eight escaped] nine↩︎

  6. ten 7 eleven↩︎

  7. nested↩︎

  8. twelve *emphasis↩︎

  10. sixteen *emphasis↩︎

  11. eighteen nineteen↩︎
